frameDefinitions: An Agent or Entity becomes sufficient enough to meet a Standard.
An Item is located on a Scale relative to a critical value which is determined by some Enabled_situation.
A Useful_location is accessible to some (possibly generic)
A Theme has access to a Useful_location or is blocked from it by a Barrier. '' 'Making services accessible to those with special needs is expensive.'
A Fugitive avoids recapture by or on the authority of Authorities in relation to a Crime which the Fugitive has committed or is suspected of having committed.
In this frame a Patient is in a phase brought about after a change of phase.
frameExamples: This paper does not <t>meet</t> the requirements for graduation.
I left the door to the lobby <t>open</t> for you.
Making services <t>accessible</t> to those with special needs is expensive.
He is in fact a <t>fugitive</t> of the law and you must inform the police if you see him.
Collect up the  <t>thawed</t> water from the freezer section.
listRoleDefinitions: The intentional <fen>Agent</fen> acts to meet to a <fen>Standard</fen>.
The non-intentional <fen>Entity</fen> becomes sufficient enough to meet a <fen>Standard</fen>.
An act or occurence that changes circumstances sufficiently so as to meet a <fen>Standard</fen>.
A condition or requirement that the <fen>Agent</fen>, <fen>Entity</fen>, or <fen>Event</fen> attempt to meet.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Agent</fen>, <fen>Entity</fen>, or <fen>Event</fen> becomes sufficient in regards to the <fen>Standard</fen>.
The entity whose scalar property is specified.
The <fen>Scale</fen> is the attribute of the <fen>Item</fen> that is being described.
This role identifies the <fen>Enabled_situation</fen> by which the critical value is judged.
The <fen>Theme</fen> whose motion is blocked or free.
The place or thing that the <fen>Theme</fen> is headed towards, despite a potential or actual <fen>Barrier</fen>.
An entity that (at least potentially) prevents the <fen>Theme</fen> from getting to the <fen>Useful_location</fen>.
The time when the <fen>Useful_location</fen> is or is not accessible.
The <fen>Theme</fen> whose motion is blocked or free.
The place or thing that the <fen>Theme</fen> is headed towards, despite a potential or actual <fen>Barrier</fen>.
An entity, event, or state that (at least potentially) prevents the <fen>Theme</fen> from getting to the <fen>Useful_location</fen>.
The <fen>Fugitive</fen> has escaped and/or is evading capture by law enforcement <fen>Authorities</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Fugitive</fen> is evading law enforcement.
This role identifies the general <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Fugitive</fen> is located.
The <fen>Substance</fen> is the entity which has had its phase altered.
listRoleExamples: It was <fex>hot</fex> enough to ignite the iron.
Can He make a rock too heavy <fex>for Him to lift</fex>?
Only two years earlier <fex>she</fex> had been on the lam from charges of embezzlement.
He was a fugitive <fex>in the early 1990s</fex>.
Sloan, on the lam <fex>in Michigan</fex> for the last five months, is due to appear in court this Monday.
